A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I had a blast and was really surprised by how far this movie went. There were a few points where it kinda dragged\, and some ideas weren't executed as well as they could have been. Despite those moments\, it was still a thoroughly enjoyable film. Nothing happened that is worth all this hate its getting\, so please don't send death threats to the director or the cast. There is no movie in the world that is that bad.
